title: Bharat Forge-backed Tork Motors to start deliveries from April, six years after product unveil
description: Bharat Forge-backed Tork Motors plans to start delivering its first electric motorcycle to customers from April, becoming one of the few companies selling motorcycles in a market dominated by electric scooters.
